title: Highly diversified portfolio
description: As loans are de-risked over a network, each lender enjoys a diversified basket of smaller loans

title: Strong reinforcement mechanism
description: As borrower's social trustors are involved in the loan, there is a significant barrier to defaulting

title: Optimized interest rates
description: Technology can be configured to give best possible interest rate for borrowers, or lenders, based on context

title: Works without traditional risk data
description: Formalizing lending based on societal trust allows inclusion of those marginalized by traditional risk models

title: Highly secure loans
description: A borrower's network acts as a guarantor, and can be configured to layer on even more guarantee

title: Very low transaction cost
description: Algorithmized underwriting and DLT-enabled disbursal and collection ensures low transaction cost
